bibl.title: On Village and Polis in Byzantine Egypt.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Keenan, James G.

bibl.note: The main purpose of this paper is to point out the consistency with which Byzantine Egyptian "politai" dominated their contemporary villagers in a variety of economic relationships. The implications of that consistency must be reserved for future study.
Keenan James G., On Village and Polis in Byzantine Egypt.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 479-485.
